snippet: Long after a Poughkeepsie man reported his wife missing, his own death and efforts to ready their home for sale led to the discovery of her remains.
abstract: Contractor discovers body of JoAnn Nichols, woman who went missing in 1985,  stuffed in container inside false basement wall of her home in Poughkeepsie, NY; death of her husband James L Nichols Jr, who reported her missing,  in 2012 led to Duchess County officials taking possession of property and preparing it for sale.
lead_paragraph: Long after a Poughkeepsie man reported his wife missing, his own death and efforts to ready their home for sale led to the discovery of her remains.

headline.main: Answer to 1985 Disappearance Is Found in Home’s Wall
headline.print_headline: Answer to 1985 Disappearance Is Found in Home’s Wall
